text: Mogens Just Mikkelsen (born 23 October 1962 in Bogense) is a Danish Olympic Star class sailor. He competed in the 1988 and 1992 Summer Olympics, finishing 9th in 1992 together with Benny F. Andersen.Mogens Just Mikkelsen at Sports Reference ==References== Category:Olympic sailors of Denmark Category:Danish male sailors (sport) Category:Star class sailors Category:Sailors at the 1988 Summer Olympics – Star Category:Sailors at the 1992 Summer Olympics – Star Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Nordfyn Municipality
title: Mogens Just Mikkelsen
